Message:
Eventually, Nebra and I were
taken in by the nun of a church,
and lived as a family with
the other orphans there.

The nun was a warmhearted,
kind person, just like Nebra...

But, this world takes
the kindest of us first...

The nun was murdered...
by the hands of humans
who despised witches.

I knew witches and humans
should never have tried to coexist...
At this rate, someday,
even Nebra will...

I’ll change the world
before that can happen.
I’ll make a world where
she never has to cry...

“We’ll make the place
we belong by our own hands.
Those who agree, come with me.”

Afterwards, I left the church
with my comrades,
even smacking Nebra’s hand
away as she tried to stop me...

I never wanted her
to leave my side,
but I couldn’t risk
putting her in danger.

This is the last time
I’ll ever make her cry...

I’ll come back for you
one day, Nebra.
I swear it.
So until then, wait for me...!

I marched forward,
desperately resisting
the urge to turn back.
